ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon salted butter, cut into small pieces

cookingTips: Slice potatoes thinly and uniformly for even cooking in the milk sauce
Arrange potatoes and onions in the bottom of the dish before adding fish to ensure they cook properly
Add milk gradually until it just covers the potatoes to prevent overflow while baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook in creating a comforting one-dish meal by managing layer arrangement and milk quantity for proper cooking and creamy consistency.
